# Navigation {background-color='{{< brand color yellow >}}' background-image='../../img/background-hex-shapes.svg' background-opacity='0.5'}

## Top navigation

::::: {.columns}
::: {.column width="40%"}
```` {.yaml filename="_quarto.yml" code-line-numbers="6-9"}
project:
  type: website

website:
  title: "My site"
  navbar:
    left:
      - href: index.qmd
        text: Home

format:
  html:
    toc: true
````
:::

::: {.column width="60%"}
![](img/navbar-1.png){width="100%"}
:::
:::::

::: footer
Documentation: <https://quarto.org/docs/websites/website-navigation.html#top-navigation>{target="_blank"}
:::

## Add new page

::::: {.columns}
::: {.column width="40%"}
```` {.yaml filename="_quarto.yml" code-line-numbers="10"}
project:
  type: website

website:
  title: "My site"
  navbar:
    left:
      - href: index.qmd
        text: Home
      - about.qmd

format:
  html:
    toc: true
````
:::

::: {.column width="60%"}
![](img/navbar-2.png){width="100%"}
:::
:::::

::: footer
Documentation: <https://quarto.org/docs/websites/website-navigation.html#top-navigation>{target="_blank"}
:::


## Entry titles

::::: {.columns}
::: {.column width="40%"}

```` {.yaml filename="_quarto.yml" code-line-numbers="4-6"}
website:
  navbar:
    left:
      - href: index.qmd
        text: Home
      - about.qmd
````

:::

::: {.column width="60%"}

- Use `href` + `text` to control the link title
- Use the `.qmd` filename to use that page's title as the link title
:::
:::::

::: footer
Documentation: <https://quarto.org/docs/websites/website-navigation.html#top-navigation>{target="_blank"}
:::

## Dropdowns

::::: {.columns}
::: {.column width="50%"}

```` {.yaml filename="_quarto.yml" code-line-numbers="9-16"}

  navbar:
    left:
      - href: index.qmd
````

## Automatic sidebar

::::: {.columns}
::: {.column width="50%"}
```` {.yaml filename="_quarto.yml" code-line-numbers="6-10"}
website:
  sidebar:
    contents:
      - href: index.qmd
        text: Home
      - section: Research
        contents:
          - research/project1.qmd
          - research/project2.qmd
          - research/project3.qmd
````
:::

::: {.column width="50%"}
```` {.yaml filename="_quarto.yml" code-line-numbers="6-7"}
website:
  sidebar:
    contents:
      - href: index.qmd
        text: Home
      - section: Research
        contents: research/*
````
:::
:::::

::: footer
Documentation: <https://quarto.org/docs/websites/website-navigation.html#auto-generation>{target="_blank"}
:::


## Hybrid navigation

Have a different sidebar for different sections!

```` {.yaml filename="_quarto.yml" code-line-numbers="7-8,10-15"}
website:
  navbar: 
    left: 
      - href: index.qmd
        text: Home
      - about.qmd
      - text: "Research"
        href: research/index.qmd
  sidebar:
    - title: "Research"
      contents:
        - research/index.qmd
        - research/project1.qmd
        - research/project2.qmd
        - research/project3.qmd
````

::: footer
Documentation: <https://quarto.org/docs/websites/website-navigation.html#hybrid-navigation>{target="_blank"}
:::
